body:
Hey,

Due to the community split of languages, I wanted to make a thread to hopefully help you guys be able to comfortably talk to a staff member in your own language without translation issues. The following staff are able to speak more than 1 language, and should be more than willing to help you out. Not every staff member is fluent in said language, but may know enough to piece sentences together or is progressively/actively learning in that language subject. Refs are included.

Filipino 
StormzInvader (English, Filipino)

German
resepignev (English, German)
Mango_ (English, German, French)

Swedish
Regendary (English, Swedish)
Newcleus (English, Korean, Swedish)

Spanish
timaeusTestified (English, Spanish)
javipepe (English, French, Spanish)
OscarElNana (English, Spanish)
kycraft (English, Spanish)
Legoman2302 (English, Spanish)

Korean
MidnightBeats (English, Korean)
Newcleus (English, Korean, Swedish)

French
pavilion99 (English, French)
javipepe (English, French, Spanish)
PraecanoVenen (English, French)
Timothee38 (English, French)
SirCyanide (English, French)
Mango_ (English, German, French)
Blizzem_ (English, French)

Italian
P0s3id0n_ (English, Italian)
Vobaseball12 (English, Italian)

Chinese (Mandarin)
Cyneric_ (English, Mandarin)

Urdu
Snoozin (English, Urdu)

Dutch
Pelpelajax (English, Dutch)
JustBudah (English, Dutch)

Pacifican Languages 
Joltz_ (English, Pacifican Languages)

Hopefully more will be included in the team, as we don't have a huge amount now. There also, however, may be more included in the thread as statistics are gathered. :D

Lanuauge dropouts:
Riskayyy (Australian Slang)
